item.title: PS5 Has 6 Big Games Releasing in November 2025
item.description:
PlayStation 5 owners have at least six higher profile new game releases to look forward to in November 2025. 2025 has been a strong year for the PlayStation 5, with Sony's latest console home to some of the biggest and best new game releases. Among the PS5's impressive 2025 lineup are console-exclusive games like the blockbuster open world samurai game Ghost of Yotei and the gorgeous 3D platformer Sword of the Sea .

2025 is coming to a close, and we are at the tail-end of the fall gaming rush. New game releases are starting to slow down and won't pick back up in earnest until around spring of next year. But that doesn't mean there aren't still big new game releases that PS5 owners will want to mark their calendars for in November and December.

As far as November goes, the offerings are admittedly light, but there are some notable game releases nevertheless. On November 4, PS5 gamers can check out 1000xRESIST and Satisfactory , two titles that have already earned critical acclaim on PC and should be great additions to the PS5 library. On November 13, PUBG: Battlegrounds is finally getting a native PS5 release, complete with performance and resolution upgrades. The next day, Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 will hit the PS5 with its 4-player co-op campaign, standard CoD multiplayer, and round-based Zombies. That same day, the popular free-to-play MMO Where Winds Meet is coming to PS5. Finally, former Xbox console exclusive game STALKER 2: Heart of Chornobyl is making its PS5 debut in November, with the FPS landing on the console on November 20.

Upcoming PS5 Games for November 2025

  • 1000xRESIST - November 4
  • Satisfactory - November 4
  • PUBG: Battlegrounds - November 13
  • Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 - November 14
  • Where Winds Meet - November 14
  • STALKER 2: Heart of Chornobyl - November 20

There isn't a huge new PS5 exclusive releasing in November 2025, but these games should ensure that owners of Sony's latest console still have plenty to play. Gamers that prefer narrative-driven experiences should definitely check out 1000xRESIST , while shooter fans can look forward to PUBG , Black Ops 7 , and STALKER 2 . Simulation fans will get a kick out of Satisfactory , and MMO fans will want to see what Where Winds Meet is all about. The new PS5 games for November 2025 hit a variety of genres and should keep the console's momentum going as we head into the new year.

2026 is shaping up to be absolutely massive for the PS5. Insomniac's Wolverine is releasing for PS5 next fall, while Grand Theft Auto 6 has a May 26 release date. There are plenty of other big PS5 games on the horizon, so fans of the console have a lot to look forward to in the months ahead.

item.title: All Wild Zone 11 Pokemon in Pokemon Legends Z-A
item.description:
Not counting the Alpha Pokemon, there are six Pokemon to find and catch in Pokemon Legend: Z-A ’s Wild Zone 11. An area split by a small river, Wild Zone 11 is home to some powerful Water-type Pokemon, giving trainers some great options to add to their teams.

This guide covers the locations of all Pokemon found in Wild Zone 11 and how to cross the river that divides the zone in two. Here’s the breakdown.

Wild Zone 11 unlocks after players have reached Rank E by beating Canari, the Electric-type streamer, as part of Main Mission 14.

All Wild Zone 11 Pokemon in Pokemon Legends: Z-A & Where to Find Them

There are six regular and two guaranteed Alpha Pokemon in Wild Zone 11 in Pokemon Legends: Z-A . They are:

Furfrou

Clauncher

Stunfisk

Inkay

Slowpoke

Gyarados

Alpha Clawitzer

Alpha Slowbro

You cannot cross the water that runs through the middle of the Wild Zone. The only way to get to the other side is to exit the zone, and wrap around from the other side to use one of the other gates.

Furfrou Location

  • Time: Day/Night

There are four Furfrou spawns in Wild Zone 11. Two are located on the elevated dirt track in the southern part of the zone, while the other two are near the northwestern gate.

Clauncher Location

  • Time: Day/Night

Multiple Clauncher can be found swimming in the water that runs through the middle of the map.

Stunfisk Location

  • Time: Day/Night

Stunfisk hide in tall grass on the banks of the river. There are quite a few of them to be found in Wild Zone 11.

Inkay Location

  • Time: Day/Night

Inkay can be found in the water at the far left corner of Wild Zone 11, underneath the bridge. Another one spawns just north of this one. Inkay evolves into Malamar at level 30 if the console is held upside down.

Slowpoke Location

  • Time: Day/Night

Slowpoke can be found on the northern side of Wild Zone 11, an area accessible by using the entrance nearby. An easy way to get here is to fast travel to Wild Zone 6, turn back and then turn right. The entrance will be across the bridge.

Gyarados Location

  • Time: Day/Night

Gyarados is a rare spawn that appears in the middle of the river, near the entrance. An easy way to get Gyarados to appear is to fast travel to Wild Zone 11 multiple times. Each time you do, all spawns in the area reroll. If a Gyarados spawns in, you'll immediately be able to see it from outside Wild Zone 11’s entrance (shown above).

Alpha Clawitzer Location

  • Time: Day/Night

A level 42 Alpha Clawitzer appears next to the Clauncher inside the river running through the zone. It is highly aggressive.

The Alpha Clawitzer knows the move Ice Beam by default, which is required to complete Main Mission 19.

Alpha Slowbro Location

  • Time: Day/Night

A level 41 Alpha Slowbro rests underneath the tree near the Slowpoke at the northeastern corner of Wild Zone 11. It is slow to react but very tanky.

TM Psychic can be found in the bramble vines next to the Alpha Slowbro, indicated by a yellow glow.

38
4.6 /10

Pokemon Legends: Z-A

item.title: How to Question Bystanders Around City Hall for Pokemon Legends Z-A's Rank D Mission
item.description:
In the Reaching Rank D main story mission in Pokemon Legends: Z-A , you'll team up with Emma to help Ivor find his missing sister, Gwynn . A part of the quest will take you to City Hall in Jaune Sector 9, where your objective is to question bystanders around the building to figure out where Gwynn has gone.

And because there's a lot of random people standing around, some Pokemon Legends: Z-A players may get tripped up on who to speak to to progress the quest. Keep reading below to figure out how to find the correct bystander to find Gwynn's whereabouts .

Which Bystander to Question in Pokemon Legends: Z-A

Reaching Rank D

To save you a bunch of time, right when the cutscene with Emma ends at the front of City Hall, go to the courtyard to the left side of the building (if you're facing it).

You'll see a little square with a water fountain in the middle and there's a woman with dark hair and a blue sweater right next to it. You'll see the text "The Fist of Justice, huh?" over their head. Once you speak to her, you'll learn that Gwynn often hangs out at a cafe in Centrico Plaza, so that will lead you to your next objective for the mission.

For more Pokemon Legends: Z-A guides, you can check out a post on all Mega Evolutions, another on the strongest Pokemon to have on your team, a Wild Zone list. and our interactive map.

38
4.6 /10

item.title: Roblox: Fling Yourself Codes (October 2025)
item.description:
Fling Yourself is a catchy time-killer where you need to gradually increase your strength to jump off the cliff. For each jump, you will receive Wins, which you can use to buy pets and other improvements for more efficient farming of strength, currency, and resources.

If you don't like slow beginnings and want to boost your progress to advance, Fling Yourself codes make it way easier. By activating codes in this Roblox experience, you'll get awesome rewards from the developers, like Wins or potion boosters, so don't miss out.

All Fling Yourself Codes

Working Fling Yourself Codes

At the moment, there are no working codes for Fling Yourself . Save this page and come back later. We will update this page as soon as the codes become available.

Expired Fling Yourself Codes

There are currently no expired Fling Yourself codes, so redeem active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

Redeeming Fling Yourself codes is one of the easiest and most accessible methods to replenish your capital in the game. So, whether you are a beginner or an experienced player, be sure to take advantage of this opportunity to stay one step ahead of those who have not done so.

How to Redeem Codes for Fling Yourself

Before you can redeem codes in Fling Yourself , you will need to complete the tutorial to learn the basics of this Roblox game. After that, you will have full access to the UI and will be able to receive rewards. Here's how to do it:

  • Launch Fling Yourself .
  • Pay attention to the right side of the screen. There will be many buttons and options. Among them, find and interact with the one that says Codes.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and a green Submit button below it. Now, enter one of the active codes mentioned above into the input field.
  • Next and last, click on the green Submit button to send a request for rewards.

If everything is done correctly, a notification will appear on the screen with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Fling Yourself Codes

The developers of Fling Yourself regularly share freebies, usually when players are active in the game and its promotion. You can find all these promo codes on the official game resources, links to which we have left below:

  • Official Fling Yourself Roblox group.
  • Official Fling Yourself game page.
Roblox

item.title: Roblox: Strongest Mage Codes (October 2025)
item.description:
Magic, spells, impressive explosions, and spectacular tricks! These are what Strongest Mage , an unusual Roblox game where you have to become the coolest mage, has to offer. Traveling through worlds and collecting chests, you can loot cool stuff like gems, skills, or equipment for your character in a world of fantasy and fun.

Redeeming Strongest Mage codes will help you improve your gameplay even more, as it will bring you tons of Gems, the premium in-game currency. With them, you can buy anything from character upgrades to potion boosters, so use them fast before they expire.

All Strongest Mage Codes

Working Strongest Mage Codes

  • Visits100 - Redeem this code to get 20 Gems.
  • Visits50 - Redeem this code to get 10 Gems.
  • PotionsAndGems - Redeem this code to get one Gem.
  • Visits25 - Redeem this code to get one Gem.

Expired Strongest Mage Codes

There are currently no expired Strongest Mage codes, so redeem active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

Progression in Strongest Mage is quite easy, but redeeming codes will bring you a bunch of freebies and useful things that will make the gameplay even better. Even if you get bored and don't see any further progress in this Roblox game, the rewards from Strongest Mage codes can drastically change your attitude.

How to Redeem Codes for Strongest Mage

You can redeem Strongest Mage codes immediately after completing the tutorial, which takes no more than 5 minutes. Next, use our guide to understand how to get rewards from Strongest Mage codes:

  • Launch Strongest Mage .
  • Pay attention to the upper left corner of the screen. There will be a number of buttons arranged in a row. Among them, interact with the penultimate one, which says Settings.
  • Once you open the Settings menu, you will find the redemption section at the top right. There will be an input field and a blue Redeem button next to it. Now, enter one of the active codes from the list above into the input field.
  • Finally, click on the blue Redeem button to submit your request for rewards.

If everything is done correctly, a notification will appear on the screen with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Strongest Mage Codes

We have done our best and found all the possible promo codes on the official Strongest Mage pages to share with you here. But considering that codes can appear at any time, we recommend that you also visit these pages from time to time to find them:

  • Official Strongest Mage Roblox group.
  • Official Strongest Mage Discord server.
Roblox
